description:
This video shares bathroom tile floor mistakes.  If you're remodeling a bathroom and need help, join our Video Library of over 350 step-by-step tutorials at https://homerepairtutor.com/

#tileflooring #bathroomremodeling #homerepairtutor   

Bathroom Tile Floor Mistakes
0:20 Inspect floor joists and subfloor panels
0:40 How to remove plywood subfloors
1:46 How to install plywood subfloors
2:16 What should you put down before tiling a floor
2:25 Install DITRA uncoupling membrane
3:19 Where do you start when tiling a bathroom floor
3:35 Dry Fit Tile Floor
4:42 What trowel should I use for setting tile floors
5:22 How to apply thin-set for tile floors
5:52 How to set bathroom tile floors
7:49 How to cut floor tile around toilet closet bend
8:07 Metal profile for floor tile
8:26 Grouting tile
9:14 Silicone

These supplies were used in our video:

-Raimondi Fido Hand Support
-ProKnee Pads
-Perfect Level Master T-Lock Tile Leveling System
-Fein Oscillating Multi Tool
-Schluter DITR
title: Bathroom Tile Floor Mistakes and How You Can AVOID Them
